Ricochet Blade.name: Ricochet Blade
Ricochet Blade.flavor: Your blade wounds, then careens off your target and into a nearby foe.
Ricochet Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade with the light thrown property.
Ricochet Blade.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and an enemy within 3 squares of the target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Nimble Deflection.name: Nimble Deflection
Nimble Deflection.flavor: With a practiced eye, you follow a projectile’s path and knock it out of the air.
Nimble Deflection.trigger: A creature hits you with a ranged attack
Nimble Deflection.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade with the light thrown property.
Nimble Deflection.effect: You make a ranged basic attack, treating the attacking creature’s attack roll as the target AC. If your attack hits, the triggering attack misses.

Bladed Fusillade.name: Bladed Fusillade
Bladed Fusillade.flavor: You unleash a volley of thrown blades.
Bladed Fusillade.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade with the light thrown property.
Bladed Fusillade.target: Each enemy in the blast you can see
